name: Seven Seas Smackdown
description:
This game was made for the Kenney Jam 2020 (https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2020). In this jam you had to use only assets from https://kenney.nl (except for fonts and sounds).

The theme for the jam was Cursed.

Github: https://github.com/lnestor/SevenSeasSmackdown

Asset packs used:

  • Nature Kit (3D)
  • Pirate Kit (3D)
  • Particle Kit (2D)
  • Game Icons (UI)
  • Interface Sounds (Audio)
  • Font Package
  • RPG UI Pack (UI)
Credits

All of the art and some of the sound was from https://kenney.nl.

The rest of the sound is credited here.

"Bubbling, Large, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org.

Music: Pirates of the Quarantine by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Cannon sounds from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-sounds/cannon-10077/.
